fulltext:
Address 
108/11 11 street, Linh Xuan ward, Thu 
Duc district, HCM city 
Contact 
ngocsonuit94@gmail.com 
NGUYEN NGOC SON 
THONG 
OBJECTIVES 
Short-term 
Learn a new language or new technology every year.  
Long-term 
Becoming a senior Full-Stack Developer.  
ABOUT ME 
I’m currently a software engineer at HelloXom company. I would 
describe myself as a very determined and highly motivated person. The 
interest in learning new technologies is the pathway that leads me to 
become a programmer. I always welcome challenges at work because I 
believe that they will help me to develop myself further. Above all, I 
would say I’m a positive and enthusiastic person – and I relish a 
challenge. 
SKILLS 
Javascript 
ReactJS 
NodeJS 
HTML/CSS 
MongoDB/SQL Database 
Plan 
Teamwork 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
HELLOXOM  
Backend Developer, 7/2018 - Present 
HelloXom Project 
A social application for Vietnam market. The application allows users 
to connect with friends and family by sharing status updates, photo, 
chat… The difference of Helloxom from the other social media allows 
a member to create events to find someone has same favorite things. 
Responsibilities 
Clarify requirements, discuss and research technical solutions. 
Implement RESTful APIs. 
Communicate with co-worker via Jira, Skype and Mail. 
Technologies 
Javascript, NodeJS, Loopback 
ExpressJS, MongoDb 
Git, Bitbucket 
TERRALOGIC INC 
Software Engineer, 3/2017 – 7-2018 
Frankly Project 
A web platform application that facilitates build a news media system. 
The system features include create and manage content, generate layout 
of news website, analysis and SEO. The system is currently used by 
many media companies in US. 
Responsibilities 
Clarify requirements and discuss technical solutions. 
Communicate with customer via Jira, Slack and Mail. 
Develop new components in the system.  
Enhance components.  
Implementing Services Server-Side. 
Technologies 
Javascript, NodeJS, ReactJS, Webpack, Babel 
HTML, CSS, Bootstrap 
ExpressJS, KoaJS, MongoDB 
Git, Jira 
    LANGUAGES 
Vietnamese  English 
    EDUCATION 
University of Information Technology 
Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam, 2012-2017  
Network and Communication 
Newstar Training Center 
Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam, 2015-2016  
               Cisco network administrator 
   REFERENCES 
GitHub: https://github.com/nguyenngocson113 
Powered by TCPDF (www.tcpdf.org)
